summary: Determined to build the best football club in the country, Dimitry hires the German coach, Rudolph Spitz, to galvanize his rag tag team but - when the first Nazi tanks roll through the city and Rebecca, the beautiful daughter of a local banker, elopes with his star player, all Dimitry's plans must change.
cast: Katarina Ivanovska|Sasko Kocev|Richard Sammel|Rade Serbedzija|Emil Ruben|Mitko Apostolovski|Verica Nedeska|Igor Angelov|Toni Mihajlovski|Gorast Cvetkovski|Oliver Mitkovski|Ivica Dimitrijevic|Aksel Mehmet|Dimitrija Doksevski|Milan Tocinovski|Igor Stojcevski|Ilija Stefanovski|Bedija Begovska|Whitney Montgomery|Vlado Jovanovski|Petre Arsovski|Zvezda Angelovska|Salaetin Bilal|Leonardo Agushi|Petar Mircevski|Meto Jovanovski|Ratka Radmanovic|Jordan Simonov|Marija Novak|Ilko Stefanovski|Goran Ilic|Koljo Cherkezov|Igor Trpcevski|Andrej Bartling|Ivica Conev|Bereda Reshit|Jelena Jovanova|Mustafa Jasar|Sofija Kunovska|Bajram Severdzan|Jasar Destani|Blerim Darlishta|Keti Doncevska-Ilic|Djani Drnasin|Dimce Meskovski|Marko Kovacevic|Nadzi Shaban|Borce Gjakoski|Nikola Projcevski|Slobodan Stepanovski|Vladimir Tuliev|Abdula Redzep Gavros
title: Treto poluvreme
